amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. OFFSHORE DRILLING PERMITS. No funds made available by this Act may be used by the Department of Energy to block approval of offshore drilling permits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Department of Energy to block approval of offshore drilling permits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stockman amendment (A062) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 204 (Roll no. 396).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stockman amendment (A062) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 204 (Roll no. 396).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A062) offered by Mr. Stockman.
